#This page describes our working and coding conventions.

=== IDE ===
Our reference IDE is an English Eclipse 3.6 Helios.

=== Source Code Format ===
We work with the source code format defined in the idocit_format.xml (available in the Downloads-section).

How to import it:

#Open the Preferences-Dialog (Window > Preferences).
#Choose the page Java > Code Style > Formatter.
#Import the downloaded file via the "Import ..."-button.
